DATA_CODE = #{dataCode,jdbcType=CHAR},

update tb_culpro_file set DATA_CODE = #{dataCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPLOADER = #{uploader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER_CODE = #{uploaderCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_TYPE = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_SIZE = #{fileSize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FILE_PATH = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, itemCreateAt = #{itemcreateat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where itemID = #{itemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and itemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_culpro_file order by itemCreateAt desc

select
from tb_culpro_file WHERE UPLOADER LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR FILE_NAME LIKE "%"#{value}"%" OR FILE_TYPE LIKE "%"#{value}"%" order by itemCreateAt desc

select
from tb_culpro_file order by itemCreateAt desc LIMIT 5

FROM tb_culpro_file WHERE DATA_CODE = #{dataCode} limit 1

FROM tb_culpro_file WHERE DATA_CODE = #{dataCode} order by itemCreateAt desc
